full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO SENG GE'I GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED BYA BA 'DI NI MCHOD DPON PA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN, LA'ANG PHAN PA 'BYUNG DAM SNYAM PA'I BSAM PAS BLO 'PHRIN MING CAN GYIS @006B BLA MA MGON MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS, BGYIS PA 'DI LA NONGS PA'I TSOGS CI MCHIS PA THAMS CAD BLA MA MKHA' 'GRO'I TSOGS LA 'CHAGS SO BZOD PAR GSOL, ZUNG ZAD DGE BAS BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD MI MTHUN PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR DGE LEGS 'PHEL GYUR CIG , ,,)
